name: Ley-Energy Matter Converter

description: Veteran containers contain obsidian shards and a champion bag.

name: Essence of Blooms
description: Use this essence to craft a first-tier precursor.

name: Ascended Salvage Kit
description: Double-click to salvage crafting materials from an ascended item in your inventory. Stabilizing Matrices can be salvaged from rings. Dark Energy and other items can be salvaged from weapons, armor, and other trinkets.

name: Tiny Blood Ooze
description: <c=@flavor>A tiny, friendly ooze just looking for a home.<c>

description: A recipe to make an ascended medium breather with Assassin (+Precision, +Power, and +Ferocity) stats.

description: Used to craft Auric weapons.

name: Expertise in Sword Crafting
description:
Use this expertise to craft a second-tier precursor.

name: Flame Jelly
description: Use the cold environment found in the Underground Facility Fractal to safely react Flame Jelly with Caustic Paste at the ice pillar to form a Smouldering Concoction.

description: In the mystic forge, combine a Gift of the Itzel, Gift of the Nuhoch, Gift of the Exalted, and Gift of Gliding to create the Gift of Insights.

name: Attuned Vine of the Pale Tree (Infused)
description: This item crackles with the infused energy of the Fractals of the Mists and is attuned to have a bonus agony infusion slot.

name: Superior Sigil of Rending

description: Unlocks all recipes needed to craft Rage (Second Tier).
